channel.title: Setup on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: STARFACE Module
item.description: Setup In order for the communication between Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central and the STARFACE telephone system to work, a setup must take place here as well. For this you need a module which you can download on this page. The name of the Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central users as well as the respective web key can be found, in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central under “Users” in the respective “User card”.

item.title: User & Groups
item.description: Setup Groups Groups offer you the possibility to sort your users no matter if it is a subdivision per department or per team, it can be mapped with groups. Users assigned to a group will only see other users from the same group in their CTI client. The use of groups is optional. Open with the search function the “CTI Groups”, here you find a table with two columns. If you want to create a new group, click “New” to activate the editing.
